comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
From the moment i got the first exception (NPE at org.eclipse.jface.text.DefaultPositionUpdater.update) by pressing the space bar while editing a text file, every other key pressed started a new exception (AssertionFailedException from at org.eclipse.ui.internal.texteditor.quickdiff.DocumentLineDiffer.handleAboutToBeChanged). 

But after closing the editor, and reopening it, wasn't able to reproduce the bug.
